title: Project Management - Project Closing
description: A project manager is formally closing out a completed project.

tasks.description: Ensure all project deliverables have been completed and signed off on by the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: The PM confirms all SOW items are complete.

tasks.description: Ensure all project time and expenses have been logged and the final invoice has been sent.
tasks.expected_outcome: The PM confirms the project is financially closed.

tasks.description: Conduct an internal project post-mortem with the technical team to discuss lessons learned.
tasks.expected_outcome: The team reflects on the project to improve future work.

tasks.description: Archive the project in the PSA tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: The project is formally closed in the system.
